text: Alok Achkar Peres Petrillo (; born 26 August 1991) is a Brazilian musician, DJ, and record producer. He is known for his single "Hear Me Now", which was released on 21 October 2016. In 2021 and 2022, Alok ranked at number 4 on DJ Mag Top 100 DJs. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian musicians Category:DJs Category:Brazilian record producers Category:People from Goi√¢nia
title: Alok (DJ)
